{
  accessRequest(id: "{{ .access_request_for_approval }}"){
    subject
    subjectType
    owner
    status
    granter
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "accessRequest": {
      "subject": "mock.anderson@email.com",
      "subjectType": "user",
      "owner": "user:mock.anderson@email.com",
      "status": "approved",
      "granter": "mock.anderson@email.com"
    }
  }
}
